text: Tiger Woods and Peyton Manning vs. Phil Mickelson and Tom Brady in “The Match: Champions for Charity” today at 2 ET. The four sports’ legends will square off in an 18-hole match and make  a combined $10 million donation to COVID-19 relief efforts. 📸 @pgatour. https://t.co/U3b629FA1e
